sentences.english: Objective To establish a method for identification of Dangshen Guben pills by TLC.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立党参固本丸的薄层色谱鉴别方法。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To improve the quality control method for Dangshen Lizhong concentrated pills.
sentences.chinese: 目的完善党参理中浓缩丸的质量控制方法。

sentences.english: To investigate the protective effect of ethanol sediments from Codonopsis lanceolata on alcoholic hepatic injury.
sentences.chinese: 研究轮叶党参水提醇沉物对酒精性肝损伤的保护作用。

sentences.english: Eating Dangshen and Huangqi herbs is also good for this .
sentences.chinese: 吃党参和黄芪也对这个有好处。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION The fruit of Radix Codonopsis Pilosulae contain plenty of unsaturated fatty oil.
sentences.chinese: 结论明党参果实含有较多的不饱和脂肪油。

sentences.english: Objective To establish the quality control standard of Fufang Dangshen tablets.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究复方党参片的质量控制标准。
